tasks.label: Install Python Requirements
args: if (-not (Test-Path '.setup_done')) { Write-Host 'პირველადი კონფიგურაცია...' -ForegroundColor Cyan; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; if (Test-Path 'requirements.txt') { pip install -r requirements.txt }; New-Item -Path '.setup_done' -ItemType File | Out-Null; Write-Host 'მზად არის!' -ForegroundColor Green } else { exit }
